item.description: Come share your music or just enjoy the music of other singer-songwriters. The sign-ups are often filled for this Open Mic... if you are interested in playing on June 29th, you can email tom@24hourtom.com The show starts at 8pm and it is a competition. Check out: http://www.myspace.co... for more information. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be carrying a tiny guitar case and a striped purse.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Lizard Lounge Open Mic
